transforms.code:
try:
		facilityId = long(value)
	except:
		facilityId = -1
		
	if facilityId <= 0:
		return 0
	
	system.perspective.print(('value, facilityId: ',value, facilityId))
	
	query = """
SELECT COUNT([Bed].[id]) bedCount 
FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed] 
INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id]
INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Facility] ON [Room].[facilityId] = [Facility].[id]
WHERE [Bed].[timeRetired] IS NULL 
	AND [Room].[timeRetired] IS NULL 
	AND [Facility].[timeRetired] IS NULL 
	AND [Facility].[id] = ?
	"""
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[facilityId],'RITIOps')

	return result.getValueAt(0,0)

root = self.parent
	try:
		facilityId = long(value)
	except:
		facilityId = -1
		
	if facilityId <= 0:
		return 0
	
	nowClient = root.getAsClientTime(system.date.now())
		
	query = """
	DECLARE @StartInterval date = ?
	DECLARE @EndInterval date = ?
		
	SELECT COUNT([Participant].[id]) participantCount
	FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[BedLog]  
		INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[id] = [BedLog].[participantId] 
		INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[humans].[Human] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [Human].[id]
		INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed] ON [BedLog].[bedId] = [Bed].[id]
		INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id] 
	WHERE ([BedLog].[eventStart] IS NOT NULL    
	AND CAST([BedLog].[eventStart] AS date) <= @EndInterval
	AND CAST(ISNULL([BedLog].[eventEnd],@EndInterval) AS date) >= @StartInterval
	AND [Room].[facilityId] = ?) 
	"""
		
	system.perspective.print(('value, facilityId: ',value, facilityId))
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[nowClient,nowClient,facilityId],'RITIOps')

	return result.getValueAt(0,0)
